contextId.information: "in God's beloved one, Jesus Christ, we" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"access into God's presence with confidence" or "freedom to enter into God's presence with confidence" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"Because God has done all this for you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
The one to whom Christ gave the gifts can be stated clearly. AT: "Christ gave to the church gifts like these" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
That people love their own bodies may be stated explicitly. AT: "as husbands love their own bodies" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
